description: Missing or blank processing timestamp.

Gender is not already in canonical form.

Date of birth is not in canonical YYYY-MM-DD form.
Date of birth matches the ambiguous NN/NN/YYYY pattern. When DOB is NN/NN/YYYY and both NN <= 12, parse as MM/DD/YYYY.
Annual income is stored as a string or cannot be coerced cleanly.
Annual salary is populated instead of annual income.

Savings balance is negative.

Rejected loan is missing rejection_reason.

Loan approved with less than 6 months of credit history.
IP address is in a private range and likely masked or synthetic.
Spending category is missing or blank.
Spending amount cannot be parsed as numeric.
Spending amount is negative.

Distinct application_id values that are duplicated.
Rows where SSN repeats across one or more records.
Distinct SSN values that appear across different application IDs.
